website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, lightweight jacket that's perfect for cool to moderately cold temperatures. Consumers who find heavy jackets cumbersome will appreciate this design.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for the warmth it provides despite the incredibly lightweight structure
Comfortable fit isn't bulky and doesn't restrict movement
cons: Not ideal for wearing in frigid temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Bought the XXL and felt it was a little short ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XXL and felt it was a little short and baggy in the torso. I am 6'3" and it could have been an inch longer in the arm and torso. The jacket is warm and did well on the 20 degree day that I test it. I will likely return.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: 5- hood are not usage
customer_reviews.text: this is my second jacket thermobol..this is the best that I have..I winter in a vest and jacket go and I'm comfortable.but the hood is not suitable at all,it is large and has no adjustment,a light wind just takes it off your head..therefore I recommend buying this jacket without a hood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket for my husband as a Christmas gift. He’d been talking about a co-worker who owned one all fall. We searched the stores high and low to no avail. I was ecstatic to find it on amazon during the holiday season. He loves it. He’s been able to wear it on winter days out here in NY when the temp is above freezing. He says it kept him warm. He loves the style and appreciates that he can wear it to work in the city and still look business casual. What he really enjoys most about it, is how light it feels on.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.C.
